name: RACE THE ODDS
description:
What is it?

        A game I made for the Invictvs Game Jam, a 40h game jam in Porto, Portugal.

What to do?

        Go as far as you can.

Why?

        Can we not do this today?

What's with all the fidget spinners?

        That's what I want to know!

Why does this look familiar?

        *shrugs*

What's that sweet music in the game?

Neon Stars by HyipThread

Epilepsy Warning

        This game contains flashing lights. It may cause discomfort and trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Safety first!
